Translations.Text: Krome tekh, kotoryye veruyut, delayut dobryye dela, uchat drug druga istine, uchat drug druga terpeniyu
Kotoryy sobirayet imushchestvo i kopit yego
Dumaya, chto yego imushchestvo uvekovechit yego
Net, on vverzhen budet v Khotamu
O yesli by kto vrazumil tebya, chto takoye Khotama
I nad nimi smykayetsya v svod
Ne vspominal li ty, kak postupil Gospod' tvoy s soputnikami slona
Ne obratil li On umysla ikh k ikh zhe pogibeli
On poslal na nikh stai ptits
Oni brosali v nikh kamni iz obozhennykh glinyanykh glyb
Tak, On sravnyal ikh s potravlennoy nivoy
